name: chatgpt-plugin-example-dexa-lex-fridman
description: Example ChatGPT Pluginbuilt using Cloudflare workers.
author: Travis Fischer <travis@transitivebullsh.it>

aiPlugin.name: Dexa Lex Fridman Podcast Search
aiPlugin.description_for_model: Plugin for fetching transcripts from the Lex Fridman Podcast. Use it whenever a user asks about Lex Fridman or the topics he covers on his show, including science, math, physics, AI, startups, and philosophy.
